title: Rs 1.41 lk cr released to Bihar as proceeds of central taxes and duties in 2020-22: Centre - Economic Times
content: Rs 1.41 lk cr released to Bihar as proceeds of central taxes and duties in 2020-22: Centre  Economic Times
description: "Based on the recommendations of the 15th Finance Commission (XV-FC), Rs 59,861.41 crore from net proceeds of Central Taxes and Duties during 2020-21 and Rs 81,789.32 crore in 2021-22 has been released to Bihar," he told the Lok Sabha during the Question Hour.
